00029 namespace El {
00030   template<typename F>
00031     void ColumnSum( const Matrix<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& sums );
00032   
00033   template<typename F,Dist U,Dist V>
00034     void ColumnSum
00035     ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& A, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& sums );
00036   
00037   template<typename F>
00038     void ColumnMax( const Matrix<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms );
00039     
00040   template<typename F,Dist U,Dist V>
00041     void ColumnMax
00042     ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& A, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& norms );
00043 
00044   template<typename F,Dist U,Dist V>
00045     void ColumnMax
00046     ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& A, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& norms );
00047 
00048   template<typename F>
00049     void ColumnMax( const DistMultiVec<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms );
00050 
00051   template<typename F>
00052     void ColumnMax( const SparseMatrix<F>& A, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms );
00053 
00054   template<typename F>
00055     void ColumnMax
00056     ( const DistSparseMatrix<F>& A, DistMultiVec<Base<F>>& norms );
00057 
00058 #define LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,U,V) \
00059   template void ColumnSum \
00060   ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& X, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& norms ); \
00061   template void ColumnMax \
00062   ( const DistMatrix<F,U,V>& X, DistMatrix<Base<F>,V,STAR>& norms );
00063 
00064 #define LBANN_PROTO(F) \
00065   template void ColumnSum \
00066   ( const Matrix<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms ); \
00067   template void ColumnMax \
00068   ( const Matrix<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms ); \
00069   template void ColumnMax \
00070   ( const SparseMatrix<F>& A, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms ); \
00071   template void ColumnMax \
00072   ( const DistSparseMatrix<F>& A, DistMultiVec<Base<F>>& norms ); \
00073   template void ColumnMax \
00074   ( const DistMultiVec<F>& X, Matrix<Base<F>>& norms ); \
00075   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,MC,  MR  ) \
00076   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,MC,  STAR) \
00077   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,MD,  STAR) \
00078   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,MR,  MC  ) \
00079   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,MR,  STAR) \
00080   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,STAR,MC  ) \
00081   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,STAR,MD  ) \
00082   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,STAR,MR  ) \
00083   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,STAR,STAR) \
00084   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,STAR,VC  ) \
00085   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,STAR,VR  ) \
00086   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,VC,  STAR) \
00087   LBANN_PROTO_DIST(F,VR,  STAR)
